data.title: Learning React the Hard Way
data.author: Alex Morgan
data.body: I broke my app five times today, and somehow learned more than any tutorial. updated

data.title: Why Pagination Matters
data.author: Sam Patel
data.body: Loading everything at once feels easy until your app slows to a crawl.

data.title: Bugs Are Teachers
data.author: Jamie Lee
data.body: Every error message is just the code asking you to think a little deeper.

data.title: Fetch, Fail, Fix
data.author: Taylor Nguyen
data.body: Most of frontend work is waiting for APIs and fixing what comes back wrong.

data.title: Small Wins in JavaScript
data.author: Chris Walker
data.body: When the UI finally updates correctly, it feels better than it should.
